channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- LiveSync for WordPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- LiveSync for WordPress

item.title: CVE-2022-1712|2024-08-03T00:10:03.917Z -- unknown -- livesync%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The LiveSync for WordPress plugin through 1.0 does not have CSRF check in place when updating its settings, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack
